glsl3.frag:
precision highp float;
#define QUATER_PI         0.78539816340
#define HALF_PI           1.57079632679
#define PI                3.14159265359
#define PI2               6.28318530718
#define PI4               12.5663706144
#define INV_QUATER_PI     1.27323954474
#define INV_HALF_PI       0.63661977237
#define INV_PI            0.31830988618
#define INV_PI2           0.15915494309
#define INV_PI4           0.07957747155
#define EPSILON           1e-6
#define EPSILON_LOWP      1e-4
#define LOG2              1.442695
#define EXP_VALUE         2.71828183
#define FP_MAX            65504.0
#define FP_SCALE          0.0009765625
#define FP_SCALE_INV      1024.0
#define GRAY_VECTOR       vec3(0.299, 0.587, 0.114)
#define LIGHT_MAP_TYPE_DISABLED 0
#define LIGHT_MAP_TYPE_ALL_IN_ONE 1
#define LIGHT_MAP_TYPE_INDIRECT_OCCLUSION 2
#define REFLECTION_PROBE_TYPE_NONE 0
#define REFLECTION_PROBE_TYPE_CUBE 1
#define REFLECTION_PROBE_TYPE_PLANAR 2
#define REFLECTION_PROBE_TYPE_BLEND 3
#define REFLECTION_PROBE_TYPE_BLEND_AND_SKYBOX 4
#define LIGHT_TYPE_DIRECTIONAL 0.0
#define LIGHT_TYPE_SPHERE 1.0
#define LIGHT_TYPE_SPOT 2.0
#define LIGHT_TYPE_POINT 3.0
#define LIGHT_TYPE_RANGED_DIRECTIONAL 4.0
#define IS_DIRECTIONAL_LIGHT(light_type) (abs(float(light_type) - float(LIGHT_TYPE_DIRECTIONAL)) < EPSILON_LOWP)
#define IS_SPHERE_LIGHT(light_type) (abs(float(light_type) - float(LIGHT_TYPE_SPHERE)) < EPSILON_LOWP)
#define IS_SPOT_LIGHT(light_type) (abs(float(light_type) - float(LIGHT_TYPE_SPOT)) < EPSILON_LOWP)
#define IS_POINT_LIGHT(light_type) (abs(float(light_type) - float(LIGHT_TYPE_POINT)) < EPSILON_LOWP)
#define IS_RANGED_DIRECTIONAL_LIGHT(light_type) (abs(float(light_type) - float(LIGHT_TYPE_RANGED_DIRECTIONAL)) < EPSILON_LOWP)
#define TONE_MAPPING_ACES 0
#define TONE_MAPPING_LINEAR 1
#define SURFACES_MAX_TRANSMIT_DEPTH_VALUE 999999.0
#ifndef CC_SURFACES_DEBUG_VIEW_SINGLE
  #define CC_SURFACES_DEBUG_VIEW_SINGLE 1
#endif
#ifndef CC_SURFACES_DEBUG_VIEW_COMPOSITE_AND_MISC
  #define CC_SURFACES_DEBUG_VIEW_COMPOSITE_AND_MISC 2
#endif
layout(std140) uniform ColorGradingUBO {
  vec4 cocParams;
  vec4 mainTexTexelSize;
};
uniform sampler2D colorTex;
uniform sampler2D cocTex;
uniform sampler2D prefilterTex;
uniform sampler2D bokehTex;
uniform sampler2D filterTex;
#define focusDistance cocParams.x
#define focusRange cocParams.y
#define bokehRadius cocParams.z
in vec2 v_uv;
layout(location = 0)out vec4 fragColor;
void main() {
  vec4 o = mainTexTexelSize.xyxy * 2.0 * vec2(-0.5, 0.5).xxyy;
  vec4 s =
  texture(bokehTex, v_uv + o.xy) +
  texture(bokehTex, v_uv + o.zy) +
  texture(bokehTex, v_uv + o.xw) +
  texture(bokehTex, v_uv + o.zw);
  fragColor = s * 0.25;
}

  #define CC_SURFACES_DEBUG_VIEW_SINGLE 1

  #define CC_SURFACES_DEBUG_VIEW_COMPOSITE_AND_MISC 2

   uniform vec4 cocParams;
   uniform vec4 mainTexTexelSize;
uniform sampler2D colorTex;
uniform sampler2D cocTex;
uniform sampler2D prefilterTex;
uniform sampler2D bokehTex;
uniform sampler2D filterTex;
#define focusDistance cocParams.x
#define focusRange cocParams.y
#define bokehRadius cocParams.z
varying vec2 v_uv;
void main() {
  vec4 o = mainTexTexelSize.xyxy * 2.0 * vec2(-0.5, 0.5).xxyy;
  vec4 s =
  texture2D(bokehTex, v_uv + o.xy) +
  texture2D(bokehTex, v_uv + o.zy) +
  texture2D(bokehTex, v_uv + o.xw) +
  texture2D(bokehTex, v_uv + o.zw);
  gl_FragColor = s * 0.25;
}

precision highp float;
#define QUATER_PI         0.78539816340
#define HALF_PI           1.57079632679
#define PI                3.14159265359
#define PI2               6.28318530718
#define PI4               12.5663706144
#define INV_QUATER_PI     1.27323954474
#define INV_HALF_PI       0.63661977237
#define INV_PI            0.31830988618
#define INV_PI2           0.15915494309
#define INV_PI4           0.07957747155
#define EPSILON           1e-6
#define EPSILON_LOWP      1e-4
#define LOG2              1.442695
#define EXP_VALUE         2.71828183
#define FP_MAX            65504.0
#define FP_SCALE          0.0009765625
#define FP_SCALE_INV      1024.0
#define GRAY_VECTOR       vec3(0.299, 0.587, 0.114)
#define LIGHT_MAP_TYPE_DISABLED 0
#define LIGHT_MAP_TYPE_ALL_IN_ONE 1
#define LIGHT_MAP_TYPE_INDIRECT_OCCLUSION 2
#define REFLECTION_PROBE_TYPE_NONE 0
#define REFLECTION_PROBE_TYPE_CUBE 1
#define REFLECTION_PROBE_TYPE_PLANAR 2
#define REFLECTION_PROBE_TYPE_BLEND 3
#define REFLECTION_PROBE_TYPE_BLEND_AND_SKYBOX 4
#define LIGHT_TYPE_DIRECTIONAL 0.0
#define LIGHT_TYPE_SPHERE 1.0
#define LIGHT_TYPE_SPOT 2.0
#define LIGHT_TYPE_POINT 3.0
#define LIGHT_TYPE_RANGED_DIRECTIONAL 4.0
#define IS_DIRECTIONAL_LIGHT(light_type) (abs(float(light_type) - float(LIGHT_TYPE_DIRECTIONAL)) < EPSILON_LOWP)
#define IS_SPHERE_LIGHT(light_type) (abs(float(light_type) - float(LIGHT_TYPE_SPHERE)) < EPSILON_LOWP)
#define IS_SPOT_LIGHT(light_type) (abs(float(light_type) - float(LIGHT_TYPE_SPOT)) < EPSILON_LOWP)
#define IS_POINT_LIGHT(light_type) (abs(float(light_type) - float(LIGHT_TYPE_POINT)) < EPSILON_LOWP)
#define IS_RANGED_DIRECTIONAL_LIGHT(light_type) (abs(float(light_type) - float(LIGHT_TYPE_RANGED_DIRECTIONAL)) < EPSILON_LOWP)
#define TONE_MAPPING_ACES 0
#define TONE_MAPPING_LINEAR 1
#define SURFACES_MAX_TRANSMIT_DEPTH_VALUE 999999.0
#ifndef CC_SURFACES_DEBUG_VIEW_SINGLE
  #define CC_SURFACES_DEBUG_VIEW_SINGLE 1
#endif
#ifndef CC_SURFACES_DEBUG_VIEW_COMPOSITE_AND_MISC
  #define CC_SURFACES_DEBUG_VIEW_COMPOSITE_AND_MISC 2
#endif
   uniform vec4 cocParams;
uniform sampler2D colorTex;
uniform sampler2D cocTex;
uniform sampler2D prefilterTex;
uniform sampler2D bokehTex;
uniform sampler2D filterTex;
#define focusDistance cocParams.x
#define focusRange cocParams.y
#define bokehRadius cocParams.z
float Uint8ToFloat(float v) {
  v *= 255.0;
  return ((v - 128.0) / 127.0);
}
varying vec2 v_uv;
void main() {
  vec4 source = texture2D(colorTex, v_uv);
  float coc = Uint8ToFloat(texture2D(cocTex, v_uv).r) * bokehRadius;
  vec4 dof = texture2D(filterTex, v_uv);
  float dofStrength = smoothstep(0.1, 1.0, abs(coc));
  vec3 color = mix(source.rgb, dof.rgb, dofStrength + dof.a - dofStrength * dof.a);
  gl_FragColor = vec4(color.rgb, source.a);
}

precision highp float;
precision highp float;
uniform mediump vec4 cc_screenSize;
#define QUATER_PI         0.78539816340

#define PI                3.14159265359
#define PI2               6.28318530718

#define FP_SCALE          0.0009765625

#define IS_DIRECTIONAL_LIGHT(light_type) (abs(float(light_type) - float(LIGHT_TYPE_DIRECTIONAL)) < EPSILON_LOWP)
#define IS_SPHERE_LIGHT(light_type) (abs(float(light_type) - float(LIGHT_TYPE_SPHERE)) < EPSILON_LOWP)
#define IS_SPOT_LIGHT(light_type) (abs(float(light_type) - float(LIGHT_TYPE_SPOT)) < EPSILON_LOWP)
#define IS_POINT_LIGHT(light_type) (abs(float(light_type) - float(LIGHT_TYPE_POINT)) < EPSILON_LOWP)
#define IS_RANGED_DIRECTIONAL_LIGHT(light_type) (abs(float(light_type) - float(LIGHT_TYPE_RANGED_DIRECTIONAL)) < EPSILON_LOWP)

  #define CC_SURFACES_DEBUG_VIEW_COMPOSITE_AND_MISC 2
#endif
#if defined(CC_USE_METAL) || defined(CC_USE_WGPU)
#define CC_HANDLE_SAMPLE_NDC_FLIP_STATIC(y) y = -y
#else
#define CC_HANDLE_SAMPLE_NDC_FLIP_STATIC(y)
#endif
#if CC_USE_FOG != 4
#endif
       uniform vec4 uvDepthToEyePosParams;
       uniform vec4 radiusParam;
       uniform vec4 miscParam;
       uniform vec4 blurParam;
#define NUM_STEPS 8.0
#define NUM_STEPS_LOOP NUM_STEPS*2.0
#define INV_NUM_DIRECTIONS 0.125
#define NUM_DIRECTIONS 8
#define CONSTANT_2PI 6.2831852
#define g_AOResolution cc_screenSize.xy
#define g_InvAOResolution cc_screenSize.zw
#define g_UVToViewA uvDepthToEyePosParams.xy
#define g_UVToViewB uvDepthToEyePosParams.zw
#define g_R radiusParam.x
#define g_R2 radiusParam.y
#define g_NegInvR2 radiusParam.z
#define g_MaxRadiusPixels radiusParam.w
#define g_FocalLen miscParam.xy
#define g_TanAngleBias miscParam.z
#define g_Strength miscParam.w
uniform sampler2D DepthTex;
uniform sampler2D RandomTex;
#define KERNEL_FALLOFF 3.0f
#define KERNEL_RADIUS 8
#define HALF_KERNEL_RADIUS 4
#define g_InvFullResolution cc_screenSize.zw
#define g_BlurFallOff blurParam.x
#define g_BlurDepthThreshold blurParam.y
#define g_BlurSimpleRadius blurParam.z
uniform sampler2D AOTexNearest;
#define AOTexBilinear AOTexNearest
#define GetLinearDepthBilinear GetLinearDepth
#define g_AOSaturation blurParam.w
float Combine(vec2 uv)
{
  float ao = texture2D(AOTexNearest, uv).x;
  return g_AOSaturation > 1.0 ? pow(ao, g_AOSaturation) : mix(1.0, ao, g_AOSaturation);
}
varying vec2 v_uv;
void main () {
  float ao = Combine(v_uv);
  gl_FragColor = vec4(1.0, 1.0, 1.0, ao);
}
